items.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
items.description: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive and the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.

items.title: SpaceX stock debut is the big market event of 2026. Why Musk's venture could be biggest IPO ever
items.description: Investors have already thrown their weight behind the company ahead of its planned IPO.

items.title: The 2026 stock market is looking a lot like the bifurcated market of 2025
items.description: A look inside the S&P 500 shows a major division, with five sectors higher, led by industrials, and six sectors lower, led by consumer discretionary.

items.title: Ken Griffinâ€™s flagship hedge fund at Citadel rises 10.2% in volatile 2025
items.description: Citadel's flagship multistrategy Wellington fund, its largest, gained 10.2% in 2025, according to a person familiar with the firm's returns.

items.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Vertiv, Baidu, Warby Parker, RH & more
items.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.
